InGame.CharacterA: Mr. Chancellor! By order of my president, I need to borrow the Dash Heart!σ`∀´)σ
InGame.CharacterB: Always this hurry, huh? Is that all what you guys can do? In <color=orange>Dash Space</color>, we dash forward on the assurance that we have wisdom. Childish, back off！
InGame.CharacterA: (I must think before I dash to catch up <color=orange>the chancellor.</color>)

AfterGame.CharacterB: Think twice before you leap, good choice! I can tell that there're indeed some interesting people outside my space.
